name: Mage Rampage
description:
Note: this game is best placed in full screen, and also the in-game music doesn't work for some reason, I have tried fixing it alot but it still doesn't work so sorry about that.

This game is a highscore game where Infinite number of enemies spawn, your goal is to defeat all enemies and for each enemy you defeat, you get 10 points, try to get as may points as possible!

If you have some feedback for my gane, please leave it in the comments below! And thanks for playing.
